title: GAME CRAHES IN CHAMPION SELECT = LEAVER 30 MIN
body: Game crashes all time and i get leaver for that, solutions ???

replies.body: Try fixing your game installation and/or broken computer.

Have you tried repairing your client?  You don't even have to log in, just open the client and click the little gear icon in the upper right.  There will be a button that says "Initiate Full Repair" under the general tab.

If it's not the client make sure all your drivers are up to date.
